com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api

Class AbstractCreditCardService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salt.payment.client.creditcard.api.AbstractCreditCardService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpsCreditCardService, HttpsDebitCardService

    public abstract class AbstractCreditCardService
extends java.lang.Object
    Sends an HTTPS POST request to the SALT POST API.
    Since:
    JSE5

    • Field Detail

      • CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS_BUFFER

        public static final int CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS_BUFFER
        The number of milliseconds on top of the specified request timeoutMs before the connection will timeout. This is to ensure that there is enough time for the request to process before timing the connection.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATE_FORMAT

        public static final java.lang.String DATE_FORMAT
        The format to use for sending dates (ISO 8601 format).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractCreditCardService

        public AbstractCreditCardService(java.lang.String url)
        Creates an instance with the creditcard gateway url. Secured by default.
        Parameters:
        url - the url to the creditcard gateway. Not null.

      • AbstractCreditCardService

        public AbstractCreditCardService(java.lang.String url,
                         boolean secured)
        Creates an instance with the creditcard gateway url.
        Parameters:
        url - the url to the creditcard gateway. Not null.
        secured - true if using https, otherwise http is used

        public boolean isSecured()
